author: Nicoagudelo
title: Suprised
review: Hi... almost by curiosity I stomped into this model, which catched my attention, only to realise and remember that it was a lego-colgate joint promotion that  aimed to launch the colgate junior toothpaste. This is the very same toothpaste that I used at that time here in Colombia, so this promotion should be from latin america -i can't say exactly if the promotion was exclusive for Colombia but surely I remember this. This model brings back two bits of my past at once ! Wow !
